title: Lucid PhaaS Hits 169 Targets in 88 Countries Using iMessage and RCS Smishing
description: A new sophisticated phishing-as-a-service (PhaaS) platform called Lucid has targeted 169 entities in 88 countries using smishing messages propagated via Apple iMessage and Rich Communication Services (RCS) for Android.
